entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 5:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
